channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Stellar Blade’ Crushes PlayStation PC Record With 183,000 Concurrents
item.description: Finally having broken free of PlayStation exclusivity, 2024 actioner Stellar Blade has absolutely dominated all other former PS exclusives that eventu...

item.title: Netflix’s Best New Show Lands A 100% Rotten Tomatoes Score From Critics
item.description: The best new show to hit Netflix in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone, given its subject matter.

item.title: iOS 26 Is About To Save You Money On Your Energy Bill
item.description: Apple EnergyKit could make your iPhone's Home app an energy management tool.

item.title: A Unified Framework For Inventory Optimization And Capacity Management
item.description: Operational agility is non-negotiable in a world of rising customer expectations and global supply chain disruptions.

item.title: Status (and the grass tax)

item.title: Ready to be…
item.description: Disappointed Delighted Amazed Offended Ripped off Grateful Loved Sometimes we get what we expect.
